name: World of Tanks – Battle Masters Pack
name_original: World of Tanks – Battle Masters Pack
description:
Ready to dominate the battlefield? Then download the Battle Masters Pack! This bundle features three sturdy tanks from different nations, premium time to help you rise through the ranks, and gold to use on consumables, ammo, and other extras! The battle is yours to master!

Bundle includes: • German Tier VII Krupp-Steyr Waffentrager Tank Destroyer • American Tier V M4A2E4 Sherman Medium Tank • British Tier VI Sherman VC Firefly Medium Tank • 1250 Gold • 7 Days of Premium Time

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with a 100% trained Crew, their own Garage slot, and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.
